name: Greenwood: Amaranthus
description:
A story about the healing of a rogue mercenary, who is on the run from his past life. On his way, he crosses paths with unlikely allies. On his way through a town, he learns of the local forest that has been marked as dangerous due to a vengeful entity. Not only does he have to get past whoever that is, but he also has to watch out for anything trying to drag him back to his former life as a mercenary.

The content is not overtly LGBT but there are hints and undertones of gay/mlm themes throughout the story.

┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈

If you have any comments, advice, or generally any feedback, you can find me here at amarenth-arts! This was made within one month in TyranoBuilder. This is my first attempt at a visual novel so any constructive criticism is welcome!

I am not a coder by any means so a few buttons may be a bit broken, so please use the esc key to access the game's menu. Apologies in advance for any buggy game functions.
